director.name: 安娜·切尔纳科娃 Anna Tchernakova

this_title: Father Nicholas. The Story of Charles Sidney Gibbes
trans_title: НАСТАВНИК ЦАРЕВИЧА. ИСТОРИЯ ЧАРЛЬЗА СИДНЕЯ ГИББСА
introduction: The story of Charles Sydney Gibbes, the tutor to Grand Duchesses and Tsarevich Alexei – an extraordinary forgotten tale from the Russian Revolution.
chinese_title: Father Nicholas. The Story of Charles Sidney Gibbes
